Name: Stela of Pakhemetnu
Description: The lunette of this stela contains two udjat-eyes with an ankh-sign between them. Underneath are three lines of text containing the offering formula for Osiris-Khentimentiu. In the middle of the decorated area, the owner of the stela is shown on the left, seated with his wife on a chair. Above the low offering table, the offering formula continues in a horizontal line. The lower part of the stela is divided into three sets of two sections each with a kneeling figure and a vertical line of inscription. The surface is very worn.
